repo_description: A professional role-based-authorization service(also supports resource and group) for enterprise applications.

schemas.name: schema.graphql
schemas.content:
type Query {
  app(id: ID!): App
  apps(param: SearchParam): [App]!

  group(id: ID!): Group
  groups(param: SearchParam): [Group]!

  role(id: ID!): Role
  roles(param: SearchParam): [Role]!

  resourceType(id: ID!): ResourceType
  resourceTypes(param: SearchParam): [ResourceType]!

  resource(id: ID!): Resource
  resources(param: SearchParam): [Resource]!

  user(id: ID!): User
  users(param: SearchParam): [User]!
}

merged.mergedContent:
# https://github.com/codetrial/got-auth-service/blob/2faba0ea942aa77a01287130f4ababab0113dc45/app/graphql/query/schema.graphql:
type Query {
  app(id: ID!): App
  apps(param: SearchParam): [App]!

  group(id: ID!): Group
  groups(param: SearchParam): [Group]!

  role(id: ID!): Role
  roles(param: SearchParam): [Role]!

  resourceType(id: ID!): ResourceType
  resourceTypes(param: SearchParam): [ResourceType]!

  resource(id: ID!): Resource
  resources(param: SearchParam): [Resource]!

  user(id: ID!): User
  users(param: SearchParam): [User]!
}
# https://github.com/codetrial/got-auth-service/blob/2faba0ea942aa77a01287130f4ababab0113dc45/app/graphql/app/schema.graphql:
type App implements Datable {
  id: ID!
  code: String!
  name: String!
  create_time: Date!
  update_time: Date

  groups(param: SearchParam): [Group]!
  roles(param: SearchParam): [Role]!
  resources(param: SearchParam): [Resource]!
}

input AppEntity {
  code: String!
  name: String!
}
# https://github.com/codetrial/got-auth-service/blob/2faba0ea942aa77a01287130f4ababab0113dc45/app/graphql/group/schema.graphql:
type Group implements Datable {
  id: ID!
  app_id: Int!
  code: String!
  name: String!
  create_time: Date!
  update_time: Date
  
  roles(param: SearchParam): [Role]!
}

input GroupEntity {
  app_id: Int!
  code: String!
  name: String!
}
# https://github.com/codetrial/got-auth-service/blob/2faba0ea942aa77a01287130f4ababab0113dc45/app/graphql/role/schema.graphql:
type Role implements Datable {
  id: ID!
  app_id: Int!
  code: String!
  name: String!
  create_time: Date!
  update_time: Date

  resources(param: SearchParam): [Resource]!
}

input RoleEntity {
  app_id: Int!
  code: String!
  name: String!
}
# https://github.com/codetrial/got-auth-service/blob/2faba0ea942aa77a01287130f4ababab0113dc45/app/graphql/resourcetype/schema.graphql:
type ResourceType implements Datable {
  id: ID!
  code: String!
  name: String!
  create_time: Date!
  update_time: Date

  resources(param: SearchParam): [Resource]!
}

input ResourceTypeEntity {
  code: String!
  name: String!
}
# https://github.com/codetrial/got-auth-service/blob/2faba0ea942aa77a01287130f4ababab0113dc45/app/graphql/resource/schema.graphql:
type Resource implements Datable {
  id: ID!
  app_id: Int!
  code: String!
  resource_type_id: Int!
  detail: String!
  create_time: Date!
  update_time: Date
}

input ResourceEntity {
  app_id: Int!
  code: String!
  resource_type_id: Int!
  detail: String!
}
# https://github.com/codetrial/got-auth-service/blob/2faba0ea942aa77a01287130f4ababab0113dc45/app/graphql/user/schema.graphql:
type User implements Datable {
  id: ID!
  email: String!
  name: String!
  create_time: Date!
  update_time: Date

  groups(param: SearchParam): [Group]!
  roles(param: SearchParam): [Role]!
  resources: [Resource]!
}

input UserEntity {
  email: String!
  name: String!
}
# https://github.com/codetrial/got-auth-service/blob/2faba0ea942aa77a01287130f4ababab0113dc45/app/graphql/common/schema.graphql:
scalar Date

interface Datable {
  create_time: Date!
  update_time: Date
}

input SearchParam {
  page: String
  filter: String
}

type MutationResponse {
  status: Int
  message: String
}
